translation.en: We are Zoid. We will smash you to dust.
translation.ko: 우리는 조이드다 너희를 가루로 만들어 주마

translation.en: -Totally gonna block you this time. -Not if you can't see.
translation.ko: - 이번에는 내가 막아버릴 거야! - 눈이 보여야 말이지!

translation.en: -All right, nuggets, five minutes. -[groans] We were just gonna beat it.
translation.ko: 얘들아, 5분 다 됐다 우리 거의 끝났거든요?

translation.en: -Oh, it's broken. What did you do? -I didn't do anything.
translation.ko: - 고장 났네, 무슨 짓을 한 거야? - 아무것도 안 했어

translation.en: [both] Mom!
Now, don't "Mom" me. You can play more tomorrow. That game's not going anywhere.
translation.ko: 자, 엄마 찾지 말고 내일 하렴 게임이 없어지는 것도 아니잖니

translation.en: We are Zoid.
We will smash you to dust.
I'm with tech support.
Surrender to Zoid. You cannot hope to defeat us.
translation.ko: 조이드에게 복종해라 넌 우리를 이길 수 없다

translation.en: That's what they all say.
[grunts] Take that!
[automated voice] Glitch contained.
[Mitch] Hinobi Game Systems apologizes for any inconvenience
translation.ko: 히노비 게임은 사소한 오류로 불편을 끼쳐드린 점에

translation.en: this minor glitch may have caused
and will now restore your system's memory.
[snorts] What did I miss?
We are Zoid. We will smash you to dust.
translation.ko: 우리는 조이드다 너희를 가루로 만들어 주마

translation.en: [Phil over gauntlet] HQ calling. Come in.
Go for Mitch.
-You finish debugging that Puzzler glitch? -Another flawless victory.
Just be sure to upload all glitches from your gauntlet
when you get back to HQ this time.
Thanks for the strategy tip, boss.
[scoffs] Like I need a walk-through.
Okay, I need a moo shu pork carnita,
two fried rice and beans, and an order of won-tonquitos. Rápido, Nieto!
translation.ko: 콩 넣은 볶음밥 두 개 타코롤 튀김 하나, 서둘러라!

translation.en: Grinding as fast as I can, Papi!
Ponzu! Chorizo! Tortilla! I choose you!
translation.ko: 폰즈, 초리조, 토르티야 무기는 이렇게 세 가지다!

translation.en: Player readies for melee.
translation.ko: 플레이어 근접 공격 준비 양념 뿌리기

translation.en: He sprinkles and unleashes his power combo, the triple chop!
translation.ko: 플레이어 근접 공격 준비 양념 뿌리기 파워 콤보, 트리플 촙!

translation.en: And for the finishing move...
Flawless.
Okay, guys, it's me, K. Moon, and today is the day.
translation.ko: 여러분, K. 문이에요 오늘이 바로 그날입니다

translation.en: The seventh annual Hinobi Smash Tournament is here, and the hype is off the charts.
translation.ko: "힌업데이트" 제7회 히노비 게임 대회의 열기가 대단합니다 "화제 대폭발"

translation.en: It's set to be the biggest NS competition yet.
I'm even hearing the company sent exclusive wristbands
translation.ko: 히노비 게임에서 각 도시 최고의 게이머들에게

translation.en: to the top-ranked gamers in each city.
So, y'all, can I just say, "If you got one of these things,
I am mega jealous of that sweet, sweet swag.
Okay, so if we're talking competitors,
we gotta talk reigning champ, Mitch Williams.
translation.ko: 현 챔피언 밋치 윌리엄스를 빼놓을 수 없겠죠

translation.en: He'll be defending his title for the fourth year in a row--
Five, you're not burning my frijoles in there, are you?
Nursing those trigger fingers? [chuckles]
Sorry, Abuela, I was just--
-Five! Five, you in there? -Five!
We're stuck again.
Ten minutes. Make 'em count, playa.
Thanks, Abuela.
All right, my little rookie game grinders,
you are indeed witnessing the hidden level of Hinobi's 1993 classic, Chomp Kitty.
What? You heard it was impossible? Too much game to tame?
translation.ko: 뭐? 깨는 건 불가능하다고? 너무 어렵다고?

translation.en: Well, as long as you feed this cat enough power pellets,
you can use pattern recognition. Boom!
translation.ko: 패턴 인식 기술을 쓸 수 있지 팡!

translation.en: Endless repetition. Zoom. And your own ambition. Va-da-ba-da-voom.
translation.ko: 끝없이 반복하면서, 슝 야심 차게 빰빠라밤!

translation.en: -To make the impossible possible. -[kids cheering]
[kid] Five, you're the best.
My brother, he said you got one of those bracelets from Hinobi.
translation.ko: 히노비 게임에서 팔찌 받았다며? 내 동생한테 들었어

translation.en: You gonna be in that tournament today, Five? You'd dominate! [chuckles]
translation.ko: 파이브, 오늘 경기에 나갈 거야? 네가 제일 잘할 거야!

translation.en: Come on, you guys know my grandparents need me here.
-If I left, who would cook? -Oye, Five!
translation.ko: 내가 가면 요리는 누가 해? 파이브! 어서 들어와!

translation.en: -Bring yourself back in here! -Ooh, sorry, Papi. I was in the zone!
translation.ko: 파이브! 어서 들어와! 죄송해요, 할아버지 잠깐 정신이 팔렸어요

translation.en: Huh? You shut the fryer off?
Found this on the floor. Has your name on it.
translation.ko: 바닥에 이런 게 있더구나 네 이름이 쓰여 있어

translation.en: That? Oh, that's nothing. [chuckles]
-Sure seems like something. -We looked online.
translation.ko: 중요한 물건 같은데 인터넷에서 검색해 보니

translation.en: Says only the best gamers in the city get these.
Says first prize is a job at the Hinobi Game Store.
translation.ko: 1등은 히노비 게임 센터에서 일할 수 있다던데

translation.en: I'd think you'd want an opportunity like that, yeah?
translation.ko: 그런 기회를 놓치면 안 되지 않겠니?

translation.en: Of course I would, but the game's today and I gotta work.
translation.ko: 그렇기는 하지만 경기가 오늘인데 전 일해야죠

translation.en: Besides, even if I won, you guys can't afford to replace me, so--
translation.ko: 제가 1등 한다 해도 가게에는 제가 있어야 하고요

translation.en: That's not your problem.
-All you gotta do is play your heart out. -[gasps] Really?
translation.ko: 넌 그저 최선을 다해서 게임하면 돼 정말요?

translation.en: You guys mean it? You'd leave work to take me to the game?
translation.ko: 진짜죠? 가게 문 닫고 저 데려다주실 거예요?

translation.en: Hey, who needs to leave? We'll take our work with us! [laughs]
translation.ko: 문을 닫긴 왜 닫아! 가게를 옮기면 되지!

translation.en: But this truck hasn't moved since before I was born!
translation.ko: 제가 태어난 후로 이 트럭은 움직인 적이 없잖아요

translation.en: [laughs] It's only a few miles. We can still make it!
-[Papi] Hinobi, here we come! -[Five] Whoo-hoo!
Yeah! Perfect! Perfect! You're a legend!
I am a legend.
[groans] Can't you play in the living room, Miko?
You see this?
This means your big sis is gonna wreck a bunch of fools today.
translation.ko: 이 언니가 오늘 얼간이들 코를 납작하게 만들겠다는 뜻이다

translation.en: I'm invincible!
-[music stops] -What?
Mom says come to breakfast before you shake the house apart.
translation.ko: 엄마가 집 무너뜨리지 말고 아침 먹으러 오래

translation.en: You can pull the plug on my TV, but you can't pull the plug on destiny!
translation.ko: TV 코드는 뽑을 수 있어도 내 운명의 코드는 뽑을 수 없을걸! "미코"

translation.en: -[girl 1] Pass the milk! -[girl 2] Get it yourself.
translation.ko: 우유 좀 달라니까! - 직접 가져가 - 좋아!

translation.en: -[clamoring continues] -[dog barks]
[girl 1] Did you eat all of the cereal?
-You're the worst. -[girl 2] I am.
Two minutes to minivan. Phones off, shoes on. No ifs, ands or--
translation.ko: 2분 내로 차에 타렴 휴대전화 끄고 신발 신고...

translation.en: Miko, what are you wearing? I bought you a blouse at Bullseye.
translation.ko: 미코, 옷이 이게 뭐야? 엄마가 블라우스 사줬잖아

translation.en: Mom! It's my good luck shirt. For the Hinobi Smash Tournament today.
translation.ko: 엄마, 이건 행운의 셔츠예요 오늘 히노비 게임 대회가 있어요

translation.en: What is she talking about? What are you talking about?
I posted a note about this on the busy board a month ago!
[sighs] I'm showing Geoffery's ballet recital, Lexi's hockey playoff,
translation.ko: 제프리와 발레 공연 보러 가고 렉시는 하키 경기가 있고

translation.en: Nika's science fair soft open, Lee's preschool parade,
translation.ko: 니카의 과학 전람회 리의 유치원 퍼레이드...

translation.en: and... huh? What exactly is Hinobi Smash?
translation.ko: 니카의 과학 전람회 리의 유치원 퍼레이드... 히노비 게임 대회가 뭐니?

translation.en: It's an exclusive game competition.
Sorry, kiddo. We've got a full day ahead and won't have time to--
But you guys wouldn't even have to drive me there.
I can just log into the game from home!
You spend enough time in front of that screen already, young lady.
translation.ko: 안 그래도 컴퓨터만 보고 있잖아 어서 옷 갈아입어

translation.en: Now, get changed. We have a lot of events today.
translation.ko: 안 그래도 컴퓨터만 보고 있잖아 어서 옷 갈아입어 오늘 할 일이 많단다

translation.en: You're taking everyone else to do the stuff they like, but not me?
translation.ko: 다들 좋아하는 곳에 데려다주면서 저만 안 된다고요?

translation.en: -That's not fair! -[beeping]
Okay, that's time! I want butts in belts people!
Din, din. Do it now, do it now!
Tell you what. You can have a little extra game time tomorrow. Okay, kiddo?
translation.ko: 내일은 게임할 시간이 있을 거야 알았지?

translation.en: Gang's all here. Let's go!
[mimicking parents] Miko, it was very irresponsible of you to bail on family day.
translation.ko: '미코, 가족이 함께하는 날인데 무책임하게 혼자 쏙 빠졌구나'

translation.en: What do you have to say for yourself?
[in normal voice] I say you're looking at a first place champion, Mom and Dad!
translation.ko: 말씀 드리죠 저 챔피언 됐어요, 엄마 아빠!

translation.en: Oye, muchachos! Who's hungry? [laughs]
[Five] Oh, man. Look at all those people.
Oh, nerds, oh, nerds, oh, nerds.
Get out of that head, you. I swear, you're gonna get lost in there one day,
translation.ko: 괜한 걱정 말거라 생각이 많으면 길을 잃는단다

translation.en: and I'm not gonna be able to get you out!
translation.ko: 그때는 할머니도 널 구해줄 수 없어

translation.en: Eh, just have fun. Try not to think too hard.
translation.ko: 편하게 즐기렴 너무 심각하게 생각하지 마

translation.en: [announcer] We are coming at you live
from the Hinobi Store located in the Bailley Square Mall,
translation.ko: 여기는 베일리 광장 쇼핑몰의 히노비 게임 센터!

translation.en: bringing you this year's Nobi Smash challenge,
sponsored by Hinobi Games and Buzzcore Beverages.
And guess who's out there, pumpin' up this crowd.
They know him. They grew up with him.
Nobi, the Hinobi Honeybee!
Man, that thing creeps me out.
Uh, hi. Sorry, do you work here?
No, I just make it a point to accessorize all my button-downs
with manager name tags.
I, uh, have this? Whoa! He's the missing player.
Took your sweet time logging in, didn't you?
Great. Let's incite this riot.
translation.ko: 로그인이 늦었구나 안 그래? 좋다! 이제 신나게 놀아 볼까?

translation.en: [announcer] Give it up for High Five!
All eyes on you, champ.
Okay, we're doing standard competition rule set.
translation.ko: 우리는 표준 경기 규정을 따르고 있어

translation.en: You'll be playing on a new map designed specifically for this tournament.
translation.ko: 경기를 위해 설계된 새 지도를 사용할 거고

translation.en: So no outside communication is permitted in play,
and there will be absolutely no respawns. Any questions?
translation.ko: 부활은 절대 불가야 궁금한 점 있어?

translation.en: [stammers] Did you just say no respawns?
Yep. If you're out, you're out.
So don't get nauseous, faint or freak out, and you should do just fine.
translation.ko: 멀미하거나 기절하거나 놀라 자빠지지만 않으면 돼

translation.en: [Five chuckles] Whoa!
This is amazing!
Mitch Williams? Is everyone seeing this?
I'm meeting Mitch Williams!
I can't believe it. I learned so much from watching your Let's Play videos.
translation.ko: 밋치 윌리엄스를 만나다니 믿기지 않아! '같이 놀아요' 비디오 보면서 정말 많이 배웠어

translation.en: [laughs] Thanks.
translation.ko: '같이 놀아요' 비디오 보면서 정말 많이 배웠어 고맙다

translation.en: [announcer] We'll be ready to start once our remote players finish logging in!
Here comes one now!
[in deep voice] I am ME_K.O.! Join me or die!
translation.ko: 나는 미 케이 오 내 편이 아니면 죽음이다!

translation.en: [in normal voice] Hey, who disabled the voice filter?
translation.ko: 이봐, 음성 필터 끈 사람 누구야?

translation.en: -I'm okay. -Whoa!
You're ME_K.O., aren't you?
translation.ko: - 미 케이 오, 맞지? - 맞아, 너는...

translation.en: Yeah! And you are... Hi_5?
translation.ko: - 미 케이 오, 맞지? - 맞아, 너는... 하이파이브? 내가 아는 플레이어였나?

translation.en: Do I know that gamer tag?
-[announcer] Defeated by ME_K.O.! -[groans]
-[announcer] Sniped by ME_K.O.! -[groans]
[announcer] Obliterated by ME_K.O.! Aw, come on!
Nope. [giggles nervously]
Oh, nerds. Relax, bro.
No matter what happens out there, we're all gamers.
translation.ko: 무슨 일이 있어도 우리는 모두 게이머니까!

translation.en: Thanks. [announcer] Three, two, one! Smash!
And gamers play to win!
translation.ko: 게이머라면 자고로 우승을 노려야 하는 법!

translation.en: Hey, man! Let go of my leg!
Uh-uh! I am not letting go of your leg!
Ugh, fine. Then grab the ball!
-[Miko] Upsies! -[Five exclaims]
-You owe me one! -It's on.
translation.ko: - 내 덕인 줄 알아! - 이제 시작이다!

translation.en: [Miko] What up?
Yes! [Miko in singsong] Duh-nuh-nuh, this is my theme song, nuh nuh!
Bringing rainbows of pain. Miko is the best!
Heads up!
Ah, yeah!
You're Mitch Williams!
-And you're not. -[exclaims]
You believe that rager? I guess that's why he's number one.
translation.ko: - 방금 저 투덜이 봤어? - 투덜이라서 1등인가 봐

translation.en: Number one dingleberry, maybe.
Ugh! I so wanna beat this guy.
All right, look, I just say we gang up on him.
When it's down to just us, best shot wins?
translation.ko: 우리 둘만 남으면 실력자가 이기는 걸로

translation.en: -Death to dingleberries! -Uh, was that a yes?
Sorry!
Wait up. I think I got a plan to get us to the final platform.
translation.ko: 잠깐만, 최종 플랫폼까지 갈 수 있는 방법이 있어

translation.en: We're on the final platform!
[Five] Yes! Okay, but slow down. These tiles may be booby-trapped.
translation.ko: 좋았어! 대신 속도를 낮춰 이 타일이 부비트랩일지도 몰라

translation.en: Slow down? It's a race! [Wilhelm] Coming through!
Okay, that's a game changer.
[Five] Let's go!
Hold still, you slippery sandworm.
You two realize this isn't co-op, right? There's only one winner, me!
translation.ko: 이거 파티플레이 아닌 거 알지? 승자는 한 명뿐이야, 바로 나!

translation.en: -Hey, look out! -[both scream]
-Close one. -[Five] Hmm...
Wait. It's a puzzle.
Yeah!
[laughs] Yes! This is for the win!
Hey! Look out!
Come on!
My ball, it's stuck! Did this game just glitch on us?
translation.ko: 공이 안 나가잖아! 혹시 게임에 글리치가 생겼나?

translation.en: [Phil over gauntlet] Uh, I'm showing a major software bug in there, Mitch.
We need to pull you from the game. Not until I secure this win.
translation.ko: - 널 게임에서 꺼내야겠어 - 내가 이기기 전까지는 안 돼요

translation.en: -[grunts] -Your buddy can't score without a ball, and you're dead meat.
translation.ko: 네 친구는 공이 없으면 득점을 못 하고 넌 죽은 목숨이다!

translation.en: Looks like game over.
Not yet, dingleberry.
-Five! -[Mitch] What?
No!
-[laughing and cheering] -[Abuela] Oh, yeah, that's showin' 'em! That's right! You get 'em, mijo! Get 'em!
translation.ko: - 그렇지, 실력을 보여줘! - 그래, 한 방 먹여!

translation.en: Yes! Yes! I won! I won!
You can't score with another player's ball like that!
That was not fair!
-Yes! I think the all-star just rage quit! -[laughs]
translation.ko: 챔피언이 열 받아서 게임을 그만뒀나 봐

translation.en: [Five] And we unlocked a bonus level?
You guys saw that bogus shot, right? It can't count!
translation.ko: 아까 그 공격은 무효였잖아요 봤죠? 인정 못 해요! 글리치 때문이니 무효라고 말해줘요!

translation.en: Tell me the game's glitched, so it can't count!
translation.ko: 인정 못 해요! 글리치 때문이니 무효라고 말해줘요!

translation.en: We got bigger problems than your high score right now, Mitch.
translation.ko: 밋치, 지금 네 최고 득점이 문제가 아니야

translation.en: Plixel breach in three, two--
-Techs, gauntlets up! -[Mitch grunts]
Let's hear it for augmented reality, folks!
I'll do this myself.
-Think we can take him? -Just one way to find out!
translation.ko: - 우리가 처치할 수 있을까? - 그건 해 봐야 알지

translation.en: Oh, nerds.
[grunts] Whoa! This VR is so tight--
What the...
Zahra, Nix, with me! Take it down!
[automated voice] Hello. A minor glitch has been detected.
Please stand by
translation.ko: 시스템 메모리를 복원 중이니 기다려 주십시오

translation.en: -as we restore your system's memory. -What in the...
translation.ko: 시스템 메모리를 복원 중이니 기다려 주십시오 - 뭐야? - 10

translation.en: Ten, nine, eight...
-[Papi] Hmm... -...seven, six,
-five, four... -Okay, okay.
-Whoever wants a free T-shirt... -...three... -...you just look right there. -...two...
translation.ko: 공짜 티셔츠 받고 싶으시면 저기를 보세요!

translation.en: -Right at the big screen. -...one.
-What kinda game is this? -The kind nobody's gonna remember.
translation.ko: - 무슨 이런 게임이 다 있어? - 아무도 기억 못 할 게임이지

translation.en: Good thing you were never here.
-[echoes] Never here. -I was never here.
translation.ko: 여기 없었던 걸 다행으로 알아라 난 여기 온 적이 없어

translation.en: [K. Moon on TV] ...and surprising nobody,
translation.ko: 예상대로 밋치 윌리엄스가 히노비 게임 대회에서

translation.en: Mitch Williams secured his number one spot at the Hinobi Smash Tournament today.
translation.ko: 예상대로 밋치 윌리엄스가 히노비 게임 대회에서 - 1위를 지켰습니다 - 파이브, 주문받아라!

translation.en: -[Papi] Need that order up here, Five! -[yells]
You fall asleep on me in there, playa?
[stammering] What? Oh, uh, sorry. Um, I'm awake, Papi.
I'm awake.
-[Miko's Mom] Miko! -I'm awake!
[Miko's Dad] And she's awake.
You guys are never gonna believe what happened!
translation.ko: 무슨 일이 있었는지 아세요? 가상현실 게임을 하고 있었어요

translation.en: I was in this VR game, killin' it, like always,
translation.ko: 무슨 일이 있었는지 아세요? 가상현실 게임을 하고 있었어요 늘 그렇듯 기똥차게 하고 있는데 장난 안 하고 거대한 괴물 손이

translation.en: when a no-joke-giant-monster hand came through the plasma,
translation.ko: 늘 그렇듯 기똥차게 하고 있는데 장난 안 하고 거대한 괴물 손이 화면을 뚫고 나와서 저를 붙잡고 소파로 던지고는

translation.en: grabbed me, threw me on the couch and, zschoop, got sucked back into the TV.
translation.ko: 화면을 뚫고 나와서 저를 붙잡고 소파로 던지고는 다시 텔레비전으로 훅 빨려 들어갔어요!

translation.en: Next thing I know, the TV's all, "Don't move," and I was all, "Boom! Whaugh! Voo-oosh!"
translation.ko: 그러더니 텔레비전에서 '꼼짝 마' 하길래 제가 이렇게!

translation.en: You believe me, don't you?
Mom, please, it's not fair!
You can't just take my console away!
I can and am, young lady.
I hope ditching your family today was worth it,
because it was the last video game you'll be playing for a long time.
I was telling the truth!
-Lexi? -What?
Could I maybe borrow your phone for just a second?
Mom told me not to let you use it. Mom doesn't need to know.
translation.ko: - 엄마가 언니 주지 말랬어 - 엄마는 몰라도 돼

translation.en: Just a special secret between us super cool gal pals?
translation.ko: 우리 자매끼리의 비밀로 하는 게 어때?

translation.en: What'll you give me if I let you?
translation.ko: - 이거 주면 뭐 해 줄 거야? - 일주일 동안 심부름해 줄게!

translation.en: -All of your chores for a week. -Month.
translation.ko: - 이거 주면 뭐 해 줄 거야? - 일주일 동안 심부름해 줄게! 한 달로 해 해적 인어 공주 제트팩도 사줘

translation.en: And a jetpack for my Mermaid Mindy doll.
translation.ko: 한 달로 해 해적 인어 공주 제트팩도 사줘

translation.en: Ugh! Fine!
Okay, let me see here. Now, what was that guy's gamer tag? Yes! Here he is.
translation.ko: 어디 보자, ID가 뭐더라 이거다, 하이파이브!

translation.en: High Five! He'll know what's up.
translation.ko: 이 친구라면 알고 있겠지 씬나 씬나!

translation.en: Hype-hype! Uh, how much not to tell Mom I'm sneaking out?
translation.ko: 이 친구라면 알고 있겠지 씬나 씬나! 몰래 나갈 건데 얼마면 비밀로 해 줄래?

translation.en: -[Lexi] Mindy needs a laser blaster. -[groans]
That mongrel should be a lawyer.
C'mon, High Five, where are you?
Yes!
I found you! In an alley! No judgements.
translation.ko: 파이브! 이런 골목에 있을 줄이야 나쁘다는 뜻은 아니고...

translation.en: Oh, man, I'm so glad that statue monster didn't crush you.
-Do I know you? -It's ME_K.O.!
translation.ko: 나 알아? 나야, 미 케이 오

translation.en: ME_K.O.?
[announcer] Defeated, sniped, obliterated by ME_K.O.!
translation.ko: 미 케이 오에 패배! 저격! 말살당했습니다!

translation.en: Uh, never heard of you.
We just played in a tournament together.
You know, Nobi Smash? The game glitch? The statue monster?
translation.ko: 노비 스매시, 기억 안 나? 글리치? 동상 괴물?

translation.en: -We were in a tournament? -How could you not remember?
translation.ko: - 우리가 대회에 나갔다고? - 어떻게 잊을 수가 있지?

translation.en: Maybe somebody doesn't want you to remember.
translation.ko: 네가 기억 못 하길 바라는 사람이 있나 봐!

translation.en: Maybe some evil somebody who's trying to hide the truth
like some kind of... some, some... some-spiracy.
[laughs] Come on, I think I'd remember playing Nobi Smash with a statue monster.
translation.ko: 노비 스매시에서 동상 괴물을 만나고도 기억을 못 할 리가 있나!

translation.en: So you didn't get a wristband, and you didn't go to the Hinobi Store?
translation.ko: 그러니까 팔찌도 못 받았고 히노비 게임 센터에도 안 갔다 이거야?

translation.en: Look, the only place I've been for the last three days is this truck.
translation.ko: 난 지난 3일 동안 이 트럭 안에만 있었어

translation.en: And trust me, it never goes anywhere.
If this a joke, I don't really get it, but, you know, ha ha! You got me!
translation.ko: 농담이라면 별로 안 웃기지만 하하, 됐지?

translation.en: You were at that tournament, Five!
-You need to believe me. -Why?
translation.ko: 내 말 믿어 왜? 그래 봤자 무슨 상관인데?

translation.en: [scoffs] What does it even matter?
Because you won.
"Some-spiracy"? [scoffs]
[in English] Me, in a tournament? Like I've been anywhere but--
translation.ko: 내가 대회에 나갔다고? 난 줄곧 여기에...

translation.en: Uh, did you or Papi move this truck in the last few days?
translation.ko: 할머니, 며칠 내에 할아버지가 혹시 트럭 옮기셨어요?

translation.en: This old beast hasn't moved in the last few decades!
translation.ko: 이 트럭은 벌써 수십 년째 이 자리에 그대로 있단다

translation.en: Uh, sorry, Abuela, I gotta go.
Hey, you! Hold up!
Look, all right, let's just say I really did play in that tournament,
you're saying I beat Mitch Williams?
Uh, yeah. With my help, of course.
All right. I don't know what's going on, but I wanna find out.
translation.ko: 좋아, 무슨 일인지 모르겠지만 확인해 보고 싶어

translation.en: All right! Setting new quest waypoint for the Hinobi Store!
translation.ko: 그래, 히노비 게임 센터로 가서 퀘스트 지점을 새로 만들자

translation.en: Man, I love this store.
translation.ko: 난 이 게임 센터가 정말 좋아

translation.en: When I was little, my dad would bring me here for all the latest game releases.
translation.ko: 어릴 때 새 게임이 나오면 아빠가 데리고 오곤 하셨어

translation.en: Sometimes, we'd even camp outside the doors
to make sure we got one of the first copies.
translation.ko: 밖에서 텐트 치고 잔 적도 했어

translation.en: Wow. It's cool your family's so into gaming.
Mine, not so much.
There's that wrinkly little sandworm!
There he is! Oh, man, Mitch Williams.
I mean, he's, like, a local legend.
Did you know that he won his first competition when he was six?
translation.ko: 여섯 살 때 대회에서 처음 우승한 거 알아?

translation.en: And he's still got the highest global score on Nobi's Bubble Tea?
Well, before you finish that love letter, remember,
translation.ko: 찬사는 그쯤 해둬 네 기억을 지운 사람이 아마도 밋치일 거야

translation.en: Mitch is the creep who probably wiped your brain.
translation.ko: 네 기억을 지운 사람이 아마도 밋치일 거야

translation.en: Why didn't he do the same to you?
Maybe he did, and it just didn't take.
[gasps] Maybe I'm, like, the one, you know?
Chosen by destiny to protect the innocent from trolls like him!
translation.ko: 저런 괴물로부터 무고한 사람들을 지키는 구원자!

translation.en: Or not. I dunno.
-Let's go! Wait, stop! -[Five grunts]
[Mitch] Hmm.
New plan.
We follow him, stealth-mode style, till he leads us to his den of lies!
translation.ko: 은신 모드로 따라가면 악당들의 소굴이 나올 거야

translation.en: Welcome to Mama Miyamoto's Spaghetti in a Bucket,
translation.ko: 엄마의 손맛 사발 스파게티에 오신 걸 환영합니다

translation.en: where we put spaghetti in a bucket.
Uh, yeah. I'll have a small pail with a side of... Mmm... no.
translation.ko: 작은 사발 하나 주시고 또... 됐어요

translation.en: Welcome to Mama Miyamoto's Spaghetti in a Bucket,
translation.ko: 엄마의 손맛 사발 스파게티에 오신 걸 환영합니다

translation.en: where we put spaghetti in a bucket.
Give me two mega buckets and two apple pies.
translation.ko: 큰 사발 두 개랑 사과 파이 두 개 주세요

translation.en: -That'll be $9.75. -Boosh!
Welcome to Mama Miyamoto's-- You know, I'm not really hungry.
translation.ko: - 엄마의 손맛 사발 스파게... - 배가 별로 안 고파서요

translation.en: Holy smokes! That guy really can mess with minds!
translation.ko: 세상에! 사람의 기억을 조작할 수 있다니!

translation.en: And just made off with about ten pounds of free pasta.
-New plan. Get him! -Good plan!
translation.ko: - 계획 변경! 잡으러 가자 - 계획 좋고!

translation.en: Hey, champ, we need to talk.
What the... I remember you.
And we remember you.
You stole my win. Uh, apparently.
translation.ko: 내 우승 타이틀을 훔쳤지? - 그랬다면서? - 네가 어떻게 알아?

translation.en: How can you know about that? I reset you myself.
translation.ko: - 그랬다면서? - 네가 어떻게 알아? 내가 네 기억을 지웠는데

translation.en: Everybody resets.
Is zapping people your solution to everything?
Pretty sad if you ask me.
Especially since a tool like that could be used to help people, instead of cheating.
translation.ko: 그런 기계로 사기 치지 말고 남을 도와야 하지 않아?

translation.en: Everybody resets!
You love to play the hero, but, really, you're just some bully!
translation.ko: 영웅인 척하더니 알고 보니 순 깡패구나!

translation.en: -I'll wipe you clean! -[grunts] Stop it!
Let go! You don't know what this thing does!
[Phil] Mitch, we're showing a glitch release from your gauntlet.
[Mitch] Got it under control. Don't send backup.
translation.ko: 제가 알아서 할게요 지원팀 필요 없어요

translation.en: [Phil] Just be careful.
If that thing goes viral, it could spread through the entire arcade.
translation.ko: 조심해, 아케이드 전체로 바이러스가 퍼질 수도 있다

translation.en: Oh, boosh!
I am done playing with you two whack-a-moles.
This is a serious Mitchuation. I can't have you morons make it any worse!
translation.ko: 정말 밋치겠다 너희 바보들 때문에 상황이 악화되면 곤란하다고!

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait, wait. Seriously? A "Mitchuation"?
I used to look up to you...
and now I don't even know who you are!
I'll tell you who I am.
I'm the guy who's gonna send you back to the alley you crawled from.
translation.ko: 네가 기어 나온 그 골목으로 돌려보내 줄 사람이다

translation.en: And this time, you're gonna stay there... where you belong.
translation.ko: 너한테 어울리는 그곳에서 영원히 나오지 마!

translation.en: [automated voice] Security system activated.
Come on, try everything. There's gotta be something we can use in here.
translation.ko: 어떻게 좀 해 봐 뭔가 쓸 만한 게 있을 거야

translation.en: This is out of control. The kid has stuff that opens portals and erases memories!
Who knows what else he made us forget? Family members? Pets?
translation.ko: 또 어떤 기억을 지운 걸까? 가족? 반려동물?

translation.en: What if we already got out of here but he made us forget we did,
translation.ko: 어쩌면 벌써 탈출했는데 그 기억을 지운 걸지도 몰라

translation.en: so now we think we're still in here? What if we've always been in here?
translation.ko: 그래서 갇혀 있다고 믿는 건가? 영원히 갇히면 어쩌지?

translation.en: You might be overthinking it.
Besides, you know Mitch's play style. He likes to psyche people out.
translation.ko: 밋치 게임 스타일 알잖아 상대에게 겁을 줘서 쫓아내지

translation.en: I bet there isn't even a real security system in here.
translation.ko: 어쩌면 보안 시스템이라는 건 애초에 없을지도 몰라

translation.en: Well, now we know.
Oh, check it out, Five. A red button.
The mother of all buttons!
[Five] Will you stop messing around up there?
From the moment I met you, you've just made everything worse.
You know what your problem is?
You think too much.
-Where did you... -He must have tossed it in here.
translation.ko: 이걸 어디서 찾았... 밋치가 여기다 던졌나 봐

translation.en: Good thing you were never here.
I did beat Mitch Williams.
Give me that.
Please don't blow up. Please don't blow up.
Welcome cadet. I am BITT! A Binary Intelligence Tech Trainer!
translation.ko: 반가워요, 나는 비트 인공지능 기술 트레이너예요

translation.en: Searching for updates.
None found.
Hey, maybe he can help us get out of this van.
translation.ko: 어쩌면 이 친구가 우리를 꺼내 줄지도 몰라

translation.en: I am sorry but my services are for the exclusive use of Glitch Tech recruits.
translation.ko: 죄송하지만 이 서비스는 글리치테크 팀원만 사용 가능해요

translation.en: I also dispense food and beverages.
Fresh-baked muffin? Mmm.
[gasps] I want one for Christmas!
What's a Glitch Tech?
[BITT] Citizens employed by Hinobi
for the purposes of detecting and capturing glitch entities!
Uh, that's us all right!
translation.ko: 그게 바로 우리야 새로운 교육생으로 지원합니다!

translation.en: New trainees reporting for duty. Right, Five?
translation.ko: 그게 바로 우리야 새로운 교육생으로 지원합니다! 그렇지, 파이브?

translation.en: Uh, yeah!
She and me, we are trainees employed by Hinobi
translation.ko: 맞아, 우리 둘은 방금 네가 말한 그런 일을 하는

translation.en: for the purposes of whatever the purpose is you just said.
translation.ko: 방금 네가 말한 그런 일을 하는 히노비에서 일하는 교육생이야

translation.en: Very well.
Simply connect these Glitch gauntlets and choose "start" to begin!
translation.ko: 좋아요, 그러면 글리치 건틀렛에 접속하고 시작 버튼을 눌러주세요

translation.en: It's got some kinda UI. Like a radar, a minimap and... a targeting crosshair?
translation.ko: 레이더, 미니 맵 십자형 포인터도 있어!

translation.en: [BITT] Move your wrists up, down and side to side.
This is known as your targeting area.
Oh, I am loving where this is going.
[beeps] Glitch signature acquired!
Now calculating the shortest route.
Uh, shortest route to what?
The shortest route to intercept the glitch!
[automated voice] Sock 'em! Sock 'em! Sock 'em!
Whoo-hoo! [giggling]
I hate retro titles.
[automated voice] Glitch Techs detected. I said no backup!
You have reached your destination.
[groans] I've had it with you griefers!
I am trying to clean the mess you made, and you keep making it worse!
translation.ko: 지긋지긋한 방해꾼들! 너희들 뒤처리하느라 바쁜데 일을 더 악화시키는군!

translation.en: Chomp Kitty?
Strategic update. Run away!
[Five] This is no longer my favorite video game!
-Uh, is there an instruction manual? -[gauntlet beeping]
Mitch? You're okay?
I am stuck in the belly of a malevolent digital construct,
so, no, I'm not okay! Help me, you morons!
translation.ko: 괜찮을 리가 있나! 꺼내줘, 이 바보들아!

translation.en: You want our help?
You're gonna admit what you've done and help us put things right again!
translation.ko: 네가 한 잘못을 인정하고 우리가 바로잡도록 도와

translation.en: Fine, just get me out of here! The static discharge is frizzing my hair!
translation.ko: 알았으니까 제발 꺼내줘 정전기 때문에 머리카락이 타잖아

translation.en: [Miko] Ooh! Maybe these'll help.
Let's see. Sparkly gem thingies, feathers, mushrooms... Ooh, pizza!
translation.ko: 어디 보자, 반짝이는 보석 깃털, 버섯, 피자도 있네?

translation.en: Hey, furball, ya hungry?
You fed it a power-up?
We probably should have stayed in the van.
translation.ko: 그냥 차 안에 있을 걸 그랬나 봐

translation.en: Target glitch has gone viral!
What's a glitch?
[BITT] A glitch is an artificially intelligent plixel construct!
-So, basically, video game monsters! -I got it!
Yeah! Didn't like that, did ya?
They didn't like that. Run!
Use your gauntlets to drain its power. And get me out of here!
translation.ko: 건틀렛을 사용해서 힘을 빼 그리고 날 꺼내줘!

translation.en: Uh, hey, BITT? Do these things have multi-target?
[automated voice] Multi-target activated.
-[Chomp Kitty meows] -[Five] Come on! Let's get him!
Uh, why is he eating the ball pit?
Glitch intelligence is limited to base programming.
translation.ko: 글리치의 지능은 기반 프로그램에 한정돼 있습니다

translation.en: Oh, he thinks they're pellets!
Hurry! I am surrounded by toddler snot!
-That gives me a plan. -He loves plans.
Uh, heavy!
Oh, boy.
-[Chomp Kitty meowing] -It thinks you're food. Great plan!
translation.ko: 네가 먹이인 줄 아나 봐 훌륭한 계획이다!

translation.en: Alert! Trainee down!
Uh, BITT, can a power-up's effect be reversed?
translation.ko: 비트, 파워 업을 취소할 수 있어?

translation.en: Power-ups can be modified to nerf a target.
translation.ko: 파워 업을 수정하여 상대를 약화할 수 있습니다

translation.en: I'll take that as a yes.
Uh, nice kitty!
Looks like game over.
Delete my browser history!
Alert, a Tech needs support. Now providing backup assistance!
translation.ko: 알립니다! 기술 지원이 필요합니다 지원을 제공합니다

translation.en: -Miko! -[gauntlet beeping]
Here kitty, kitty, kitty, kitty!
Chomp on this.
Hey, pro, how'd you like your memory reset?
translation.ko: 이봐, 프로 네 기억도 삭제해 줄까?

translation.en: Wha--
[chiming] Caution, a Tech gauntlet is not to be used aggressively.
translation.ko: 주의하세요, 건틀렛은 공격에 사용하면 안 됩니다

translation.en: It is a tool to protect innocence, never to harm.
translation.ko: 착한 사람을 지키는 용도지 해치는 도구가 아닙니다

translation.en: Yeah? Well, your MVP here really needs to read the dang manual.
translation.ko: 그래? 이 MVP 선수께서는 사용 설명서도 안 읽었나 보네

translation.en: You gotta believe me, I wasn't really gonna do it!
I was freaked you wouldn't reset. Everybody resets!
translation.ko: 삭제가 안 되길래 무서웠어 삭제가 안 되는 사람은 없다고!

translation.en: You stole my win. Why?
translation.ko: 내 우승 타이틀을 훔친 이유가 뭐야?

translation.en: To protect your lame gamer status?
I'm Mitch Williams.
I am the number one gamer in this city.
You take that away from me, you may as well take everything.
translation.ko: 그 자리를 놓치면 모든 걸 잃는 셈이야

translation.en: Besides, that win was bugged. He wasn't even the real winner.
translation.ko: 게다가 그건 버그 때문이었어 넌 진짜 우승자가 아니라고!

translation.en: -She was. -What?
translation.ko: 진짜 우승자는 너지 뭐? 결정타는 파이브가 날렸는데

translation.en: But Five made the winning shot.
Yeah, with your ball, remember?
-So I guess you won. -Huh.
No matter which one of us won, he still loses.
translation.ko: 누가 이겼든 간에 밋치는 진 거야

translation.en: Please, don't!
If we wipe your precious gaming career, you've got nothing left to protect.
translation.ko: 게이머로서의 기록을 지우면 더는 지킬 게 없겠지

translation.en: I know I went too far, but do not take this from me.
translation.ko: 내가 선을 넘은 건 사실이지만 제발 이건 뺏지 말아줘

translation.en: It's what I love.
It's who I am.
Me, too.
-Me, too. -[gauntlet deactivating]
[Phil] Come in, Mitch.
After the discharge, your signal went viral. What happened in there?
translation.ko: 파견 나간 뒤로 네 신호에 바이러스가 걸렸어, 무슨 일이야?

translation.en: You wanna tell him or should we?
So... your daughter wasn't lying when she told you
translation.ko: 따님께서 텔레비전에서 커다란 괴물 손이 나와서

translation.en: a no-joke-giant-monster hand came out of your TV and trashed your living room.
I'm sorry, what exactly are you people talking about?
We're talking about offering your daughter and her friend here
part-time jobs in the Hinobi Store's new technical support department.
translation.ko: 히노비 게임 센터 기술 지원팀 아르바이트 자리에 취직했습니다

translation.en: A job? I do like the sound of that.
-Especially if it makes you happy. -[gasps] Whoo-hoo!
Thank you, thank you, thank you, thank you, thank you, thank you.
Okay, guys, you can do it now.
So, while I restore your system's memory, you will remember this.
translation.ko: 시스템 메모리를 복원하는 동안 이걸 기억하실 겁니다

translation.en: Your daughter's gaming skills have earned her a job with Hinobi Tech Support.
translation.ko: 따님은 게임 실력 덕분에 취직한 거예요

translation.en: [squealing softly] And you're so proud.
Honey, wasn't Miko just here?
translation.ko: 여보, 방금 미코가 여기 있지 않았나?

translation.en: You know her. Probably wants to be early for that new job of hers.
translation.ko: 우리 미코가 일찌감치 새 직장에 출근하고 싶은가 봐

translation.en: Whoa.
[Phil] So this'll be your day-to-day.
Cash register's here, price gun's here, pooper's in the back and...
translation.ko: 여기 계산대, 가격표 기계가 있고 화장실은 뒤에 있어

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Yeah, the place next door sells old donuts at half off.
translation.ko: 맞다, 건물 옆에 오래된 도넛을 반값에 파는 가게도 있어

translation.en: -That's all? -What's better than half-off donuts?
translation.ko: - 그게 다예요? - 반값인데 뭘 더 바라?

translation.en: Exclusive swag, early release games, live events!
translation.ko: 전용 아이템, 선발매 게임 특별 행사 같은 거요

translation.en: Yeah, if you earn points, you get the perks.
Oh, and there are your lockers.
Uh... awesome.
I got your awesome right here.
Excuse me.
-Yeah! -Cannonball!
Kids, welcome to Glitch Techs.
-[Miko] Awesome! -[Five] This is amazing!
